You will (most likely) fall in love with AI:

☑ 26% of adults admit they flirted with an AI.

☑ 40% say they would consider dating an AI partner.

☑ 25% of young US adults (18-40) believe AI partners could replace real-life romance.

☑ 15% of Gen Z worry a human partner will prefer an AI bot over them.

Are we already living in the movie 'Her'?

___

My take on it: humanity is declining. Birth rates are collapsing. We lack a positive vision of the future. An exciting world to live in.
